snippet: While it was not clear who the attackers were, the Taliban have vowed to kidnap or kill the prince, who is third in line to the British throne.
abstract: Afghan insurgents attack Camp Bastion in Helmand Province, killing two American service members; base is home to the largest number of British troops, including Prince Harry.
lead_paragraph: While it was not clear who the attackers were, the Taliban have vowed to kidnap or kill the prince, who is third in line to the British throne.

headline.seo: Afghan Insurgents Attack Base Where Prince Harry Serves
headline.main: Afghan Insurgents Attack Base Where Prince Harry Serves
headline.print_headline: Afghan Insurgents Attack Base Where Prince Harry Serves
